titles: Ukraine war: Hundreds trapped in Mariupol steelworks despite evacuations
descriptions: A Ukrainian commander at the Azovstal plant says hundreds are stuck and Russia has resumed shelling.

titles: Alabama hunt for missing prison inmate and guard
descriptions: Police now believe the guard helped organise the escape and have issued a warrant for her arrest.

titles: Uefa announces further sanctions on Russian clubs and national teams amid Ukraine invasion
descriptions: Russia is barred from competing in this summer's women's Euro 2022 while Russian clubs will also be banned from Uefa competitions next season.

titles: Israel outrage at Sergei Lavrov's claim that Hitler was part Jewish
descriptions: The Russian foreign minister's claim that Hitler "had Jewish blood" is denounced as unforgiveable.

titles: South Africa's Cyril Ramaphosa abandons May Day rally after booing
descriptions: President Ramaphosa was forced to leave a May Day event after angry workers stormed the stage.

titles: Amazon will pay US staff travel expenses for abortions and other treatments
descriptions: The firm will reimburse travel costs for various treatments in the US, including abortion.

titles: EU accuses Apple of breaking competition law over contactless payments
descriptions: The US tech giant denies it is restricting rivals' access to its mobile payments technology.

titles: Qantas promises direct flights from Sydney to London and New York
descriptions: Australia's carrier says its new fleet will be capable of direct flights to any city in the world.

titles: Haiti gang holding kidnapped diplomat for ransom
descriptions: A gang infamous for kidnapping foreigners has seized a diplomat from the Dominican Republic.

titles: Orange skies as Iraq hit by dust storm
descriptions: Experts say the storms are increasing in frequency due to drought and declining rainfall.

titles: Weather students die in crash after tornado chase
descriptions: The three students crashed in wet weather, shortly after posting videos of a tornado in Kansas.

titles: EU divided over how to step away from Russian energy
descriptions: EU energy ministers met to discuss a possible ban on Russian oil, but members remain split.

titles: Ukraine war: Families hide in cellars as Russia targets Donbas region
descriptions: Those remaining in the Ukrainian city of Lysychansk near the front line live under constant shelling.

titles: General Belgrano: The opera singer who survived the sinking of the Argentine cruiser
descriptions: In May 1982, the Argentine cruiser the General Belgrano was sunk by British torpedoes during the war over the Falkland or Malvinas Islands.

titles: Angola's Joice Zau: The prize-winning poet who refuses to stay quiet
descriptions: Joice Zau is determined to carry on despite being threatened for "telling the truth" in Angola.

titles: Shanghai lockdown: The hard life of a homeless deliveryman
descriptions: Many riders face a lack of shelter and safety while delivering supplies in a locked down city.

titles: Emotional reunions as New Zealand reopens to tourists
descriptions: The country has reopened its borders to visitors after a pandemic lockout of more than two years.

titles: Ukraine war: Evacuation of Mariupol civilians under way
descriptions: The UN says an operation to evacuate civilians trapped in a steelworks in Mariupol is under way.

titles: Biden mocks Trump at White House press dinner
descriptions: Joe Biden jokes about former president Donald Trump at the prestigious event hosted by Trevor Noah.

titles: Ros Atkins onâ€¦ China's zero-Covid lockdowns
descriptions: Ros Atkins looks at why the Chinese government remains committed to its policy of eliminating all outbreaks of coronavirus.

titles: Asylum in Denmark: Is the country guilty of double standards?
descriptions: As thousands of Ukrainians are welcomed, the government plans to reduce the number of non-European refugees.
